name: Atomia
overview: Atomia is a puzzle-board educational game. The player's goal is to arrange a set of chemical element atoms into a predefined pattern to make certain substances before the time runs out. The name and pattern construction is displayed on the left side of the screen. The element of molecule moves in the indicated direction until it is stopped by another element or the edge of the board. Every few levels the player receives the task of proper arrangement of the tubes with water. The game offers a total of thirty levels.
